sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Error
    :imgUrl="require('@/img/icon/cancel.svg')"
    :title="['Что-то пошло не так.', 'Ваш заказ отменен']"
    :button="{imgUrl: require('@/img/icon/order.svg'), text: 'Оформить повторно'}"
    @click-error="repeatOrder()"
  />
</template>

<script>
import { mapState, mapMutations } from "vuex";
 
  export default {
    methods: {
      repeatOrder() {
        this.$router.push({ path: "/rol-shop/order", query: { repeat: this.orderNumber} });
      }
    },
    computed: {
      ...mapState({
        orderNumber: (state) => state.order.orderNumber,
      })
    }, mounted
  }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
